```{r}
bbys = read.table("/home/clinux01/estadistica_exactas/datosbbys.txt", head=T)
apgar = bbys$apgar5
presSist = bbys$presSist
edadG = bbys$edadG
n = length(apgar)
```

```{r}
plot(apgar, presSist)
```

```{r}
X = matrix(1, n, 3)
X[,2] = edadG
X[,3] = apgar

teta = solve(t(X)%*%X)%*%t(X)%*%presSist
y_hat = X%*%teta


```

# Con LM

```{r}
y_hat = lm(presSist~edadG+apgar)
Scuad = (summary(y_hat)$sigma)**2
```
